title: Sometimes i feel like rage is justified.
body: Just had a supp in ranked who "didn't wanna ward" because going full AP lulu is far more fun..

replies.body: It's the teams job to ward, not just the supports. that doesn't justify you raging.
That's why I hate it when people blame the support for not warding and getting vision, especially if they're a {{champion:17}} and has mushrooms
If you are playing ~~support~~ teemo you deserve to be raged at...

This happens a lot in Bronze ... although i do agree that it is the team job to ward and not just the support i feel that there is no excuse for a support to not buy ward or sightstone for warding because support rarely buy offensive items because they don't do much damage anyway and when a support doesn't buy wards it forces other members of the team to buy more wards which could delay their item builds especially if you are an ADC.

> [{quoted}](name=SorakaXHealBoT,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rERpjHAZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-08T09:08:12.723+0000)

This happens all the way to Gold, trust me. But to your second part of the response I feel conflicted. Being a support main I always prioritise sightstone, but that being said as soon as I buy the item my team mates never seem to buy wards themselves.
What you don't understand is that supports need items too! So "when a support doesn't buy wards it forces other members of the team to buy more wards which could delay their item builds" is quite selfish IMO. 
Bottom line: having sightstone on the support **does not mean** you can neglect purchasing wards yourself.

What im trying to say is supports need to prioritise on sightstone and wards to support their teammates. I did not say that support shouldn't buy damage items. If your teammates doesn't buy wards just because you have a sightstone it is their fault. Either they are not aware that 1 person can only have 3 stealth wards on the map and 1 vision ward or they are just so stupid to not buy any. I am also a support main myself and i always prioritise sightstone and a {{item:3190}} or maybe a {{item:3222}}  if enemy is heavy CC. "when a support doesn't buy wards it forces other members of the team to buy more wards which could delay their item builds"  what i meant to say here is that if a support doesn't place wards other people especially your adc who fight alongside with you at the bot lane needs to use their gold to buy wards (both stealth wards and Vision) and this could delay their item builds. An ADC should always focus more on damage items instead of wards except for a few vision wards and if his/her support doesn't ward the bush then this could force the ADC to buy more wards to ward it himself potentially delaying damage items.

I agree, but the transition from early game to mid game to lane game requires everyone to put in the effort of purchasing wards. Sure ADCs and APCs need damage, however it's not always about the big items that change the game but what you do with that gold. Either optimise it by upgrading trinket or simply purchasing a 75 gold ward. A 75 gold ward could mean a pure ace of the enemy team or loss of the game. Sure supports can ward, but what if it expires or taken down? What if all the charges were used and you are going to engage baron? If you insist on saying 75 gold is denying an ADC on his build then your ADC is clearly horrible at farming/utilising his gold. Don't rely on others to ward the map. Have you seen pro Korean/NA players? Do you see how much wards each person buys? That is the difference between good players and bad players. Now in saying this I do agree with the OP about purchasing wards and prioritising {{item:2049}} over nearly any other items but don't rely on others, especially in soloque.

Basically this. Even though Lulu has good damage and utility when full AP, if she is supporting then it's her bad. Everybody should ward, but if the support refuses to buy a sight stone then I'm sorry but they are bad.
Well i wouldn't complain if my support wants to go full Ap but at least get a sightstone and place some wards
Exactly. It's like when I support with Morgana. I grab a sightstone, another support item, then I rush Zhonyas and proceed to build AP like I was a mid laner.
{{item:3361}} Have u ever used one of these bruh?
Lmao, I don't think your rage is justified seeing how you're just a bronze scrub. Improve your own mechanics before taking it out on others.
